name: The Last Light (Vexed Programmer)
description:
The shadows of darkness are coming to extinguish the last light! Protect the light from the shadows for as long as you can, if the light goes out, its all over!

Controls: Aim with the cursor, left click to shoot.
Tips: Aim in the middle to fire in multiple directions!

Dev Details:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/VexedDeveloper

This game was made in just under 3 hours.

Graphics: All art was created during the 3 hours, mainly with the aid of tutorials and reference material. Made using https://www.pixilart.com

Audio: All sound was made during the 3 hours. All made using sounds from my mouth and Audacity for editing!

Programming: All programming was done in the 3 hours.
